summary: This is a soundless story of the building of 'Toledo Spirit', the container ship, its sailing and eventual beaching. Insignificant men crawl on cranes and gantries to build it and other men, sans the equipment, scrape it after beaching.
keywords: silent film documentary|life of a ship|toledo spirit|ship building|ship breaking
director: Director: Peter B. Hutton (as Peter Hutton)
title: At Sea
